title: Send me your T206 want lists
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: Send me your T206 want lists
posts.post_content: I've got a large submission coming back from SGC with ~70 t206 cards graded under 40.  Commons, SL, HOF... I'll be looking to move them in bulk fashion if possible.
first time i have used this. i would be interested in any graded 10, or 20 that u might have. just starting the set, have no idea of pricing for this stuff. be kind. thank you. bobby
